## blockRendering.ConstantProvider.TAB\_VERTICAL\_OVERLAP property

Vertical overlap of the puzzle tab, used to make it look more like a puzzle piece.

**Signature:**

```typescript
TAB_VERTICAL_OVERLAP: number;
```
